title: WHOA: Kyle Kulinski Discusses The Vanguard's Noam Chomsky Interview on Secular Talk!
description:
Zac & Gavin react to Kyle Kulinski discussing the clip from our Noam Chomsky interview in which we asked him about #ForceTheVote

Watch our full interview with Noam Chomsky: https://youtu.be/Nvr6cBedtjo
